tool_description: Checks multi-currency transactions against regulatory compliance requirements, sanctions lists, and regional restrictions.

transaction_purpose.description: Transaction purpose: goods, services, investment, remittance

kyc_status.description: KYC verification status: verified, pending, not_required

sanctions_check.description: Whether to perform sanctions list checking

error_messages: Invalid compliance parameters: Ensure all required fields are provided with valid values.
Sanctions list unavailable: Cannot perform sanctions checking due to service unavailability.
Invalid customer type: Use one of [individual, business, institutional].
Invalid transaction purpose: Use one of [goods, services, investment, remittance].
Invalid KYC status: Use one of [verified, pending, not_required].
Risk score out of range: AML risk score must be between 0 and 100.
Unknown regulatory framework: Use recognized regulatory frameworks like PCI, GDPR, PSD2.
usage: Provide transaction details, customer/merchant countries, and customer type. Optionally set transaction_purpose, kyc_status, aml_risk_score, sanctions_check, and regulatory_frameworks. Returns comprehensive compliance assessment.

compliance_status.description: Overall compliance status: compliant, non_compliant, review_required

regulatory_flags.description: List of regulatory compliance flags or violations
